snippet: The Justice Department sues North Carolina over its restrictive law, while Kansas ensnares thousands of citizens.
abstract: Editorial commends Justice Department for challenging restrictive and discriminatory new voter laws in Texas and North Carolina, but notes they represent only part of continuing battle to protect voter rights; warns Arizona and Kansas have challenged elements of long-established National Voter Registration Act, move that threatens to disenfranchise thousands.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department sues North Carolina over its restrictive law, while Kansas ensnares thousands of citizens.

headline.main: The Dishonesty of Voter ID Laws
headline.print_headline: The Dishonesty of Voter ID Laws
